Citation: To James Stewart, for his fifty years of memorable performances. For his high ideals both on and off the screen. With the respect and affection of his colleagues.

Nominees: the National Endowment for the Arts
Citation: To the National Endowment for the Arts, in recognition of its 20th anniversary and its dedicated commitment to fostering artistic and creative activity and excellence in every area of the arts.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To DONALD A. ANDERSON and DIANA REINERS of 3M Company for the development of \"Cinetrak\" Magnetic Film #350/351 for motion picture sound recording.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To BARRY M. STULTZ, RUBEN AVILA and WES KENNEDY of Film Processing Corporation for the development of FPC 200 PB Fullcoat Magnetic Film for motion picture sound recording.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Nominees: Barry M. Stultz|Ruben Avila|Wes Kennedy|John Mosely
Citation: To BARRY M. STULTZ, RUBEN AVILA and WES KENNEDY of Film Processing Corporation for the formulation and application of an improved sound track stripe to 70mm motion picture film, and to JOHN MOSELY for the engineering research involved therein.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To KENNETH RICHTER of Richter Cine Equipment for the design and engineering of the R-2 Auto-Collimator for examining image quality at the focal plane of motion picture camera lenses.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To GÜNTHER SCHAIDT and ROSCO LABORATORIES, INCORPORATED, for the development of an improved, non-toxic fluid for creating fog and smoke for motion picture production.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To JOHN WHITNEY, JR. and GARY DEMOS of Digital Productions, Incorporated, for the practical simulation of motion picture photography by means of computer-generated images.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To NAT TIFFEN of Tiffen Manufacturing Corporation for the production of high-quality, durable, laminated color filters for motion picture photography.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To DONALD TRUMBULL, JONATHAN ERLAND, STEPHEN FOG and PAUL BURK of Apogee, Incorporated, for the design and development of the \"Blue Max\" high-power, blue-flux projector for traveling matte composite photography.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To JONATHAN ERLAND and ROBERT BEALMEAR of Apogee, Incorporated, for an innovative design for front projection screens and an improved method for their construction.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To HOWARD J. PRESTON of Preston Cinema Systems for the design and development of a variable speed control device with automatic exposure compensation for motion picture cameras.
